sentences.en: A succinct style lends vigor to writing.
A succinct style lends vigour to writing.
Containing or stating briefly and concisely all the essentials; succinct.
sentences.cn: 简洁的简明扼要地包括或叙述所有要点的; 简洁的.

sentences.en: Deerslayer then commenced a succinct but clear narrative of all that occurred during the night.
sentences.cn: 杀鹿人把夜里发生的事简单而清楚地一一作了交代.

sentences.en: If you have something to say make sure that it is accurate, succinct and to the point.
sentences.cn: 在阐述观点时一定要准确、简洁、中肯。

sentences.en: Keep your answers as succinct as possible.
sentences.cn: 你们的答案要尽可能简洁明了。

sentences.en: Milton summarizes the people's case in many such succinct passages.
sentences.cn: 弥尔顿在许多简洁的段落中概括了人民的处境.

sentences.en: Most C ++ programs use succinct expressions rather than more verbose equivalents.
sentences.cn: 大部分的C++程序员更喜欢使用简洁的表达式而非冗长的等效表达式.

sentences.en: Simon's book provides a succinct outline of artificial intelligence and its application to robotics.
sentences.cn: 西蒙的书简明扼要地概括了人工智能及其在机器人技术方面的应用。

sentences.en: Succinct, the graceful natural rear light combination provides a better visibility.
sentences.cn: 简洁 、 优雅大方的尾灯组合提供更好的能见度.

sentences.en: The book gives an admirably succinct account of the technology and its history.
sentences.cn: 这本书极其简明扼要地介绍了这项技术及其发展史。

sentences.en: The language of this article is concise and succinct.
sentences.cn: 他的这篇文章写得十分凝炼简洁.

sentences.en: The last paragraph is a succinct summary.
sentences.cn: 最后这段话概括性很强.

sentences.en: The recital was succinct and impressive.
sentences.cn: 这一席谈话简明扼要,给人以深刻印象.

sentences.en: The writer managed to distil his ideas into one succinct article.
sentences.cn: 作家努力把他的想法浓缩成一篇简练的文章.

trans.tran_cn: 简明的，简洁的，简练的，<古>束紧的，像是用腰带围绕的
trans.tran_en: Something that is succinct expresses facts or ideas clearly and in few words
